articles.title: "Only India Have...": England Great's Damning Take After Pakistan's Loss Against Australia - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Pakistan were defeated comprehensively by Australia in the first Test match in Perth on Sunday.
articles.content: Former England captain Michael Vaughan said that India is the only side that looks likely to compete against Australia in Australian conditions. Vaughan's comments came after Pakistan were defeated c… [+2122 chars]
